alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 6:35PM AKST until February 18 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO NOON AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected, heavy at times. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Visibility will be reduced to one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys. * WHEN...From 6 AM Friday to noon AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to develop Friday morning and continue through Saturday morning. The heaviest snow is expected Friday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
